Articles.Content:
This thread is for the preservation of the memories of the brave Kerbs who have died in the line of duty.

Many have died for the betterment of Kerbal Space travel and their contributions to the field will never be forgotten!

Post screenshots of the crew and if you wish post a caption of how they died

RIP Orvey, Franklin, and Derfid

They died while making the first attempt at a Mun landing when the fuel supply became depleted and they collided with the Mun surface.

The memory of these brave souls will forever burn in our hearts... much like they did when they violently crashed.
Looking forward to seeing what comes out of this thread. I usually avoid killing my crew but I'll be sure to take lots of good-bye pictures when I do.
